name: Speedrun Unlocked !
description:
Story:

You are sick, you are in the hospital, you have one minute to go to the pharmacy and get the magical potion/medication.

For better gameplay:

The game isn't made to play with the controller.

Don't disable the sound.

Play in full screen.

Game Info:

This game is made for the Trijam#155 under the theme: Gameplay under 1 minute!

This game is made in less than 3 hours!

I used some pre-made assets: The tileset and a player controller script.

Gameplay available on my youtube channel [SPOILERS AHEAD] : Click here

Credits : 

Font: The FontStruction “Pixelated” by “Greenma201” .

Music: "The Epic Boss Fight" by "David Fesliyan".

Character: "A platformer in the forest" by "Buch".

Tool used:

Game engine: Unity

IDE: Visual Studio 2019

Image Editor: Piskel
